thread.title: Inneo Successfully Grows into a Listed Company

author: cbs8
title: Inneo Successfully Grows into a Listed Company
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE Nantong Inneo Musical Instrument Co., Ltd
A pioneer in the China Musical Instruments Industry
SHANGHAI , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The development of the Chinese musical instruments industry has always been a weather vane for trends in the global musical instruments market. Inneo, as the representative of the new generation for the musical instruments industry and which depend s on its accurate brand positioning, fine business model and successful capital operation experience, has now been listed on the Chinese stock market successfully with the stock code 690182.
Inneo specializes in the quintessential of Chinese musical instruments manufacturing and manufacturers and focuses on the production and sales of piano s , violin s , viola s , cello s , double bass, acoustic guitar s , classical guitar s , electric guitar s , ukulele s , saxophone s , trumpet s and other wind instrument s , instrument cases, stands and other accessories. Also , Inneo has established strategic partnerships and agreements with several well-known professional Chinese factories on above musical instruments. Meanwhile, the company is run by a professional management team with profound industry knowledge and experience.
Known as an international brand, Phoenix now is enjoying its great brand influence, reputation and popularity in many countries and regions, such as Europe , North America , South America , Asia , as well as the domestic market of China .
Phoenix series musical instruments have their own merits:
The Phoenix piano, adopting German piano production technology , combines 30-yea rs of manufacturing experience in every each procedure during production, ensur ing the remarkable hand feeling and elegant tone of Phoenix piano s by using high-end configuration in the piano mark, the movement, the keyboard, the hammer, strings, slowly degrade devices etc.
The Phoenix violin inherits the spirit of exquisite Italian production technology and skills. From the selection of the raw material on front backs boards to the hand-made painted technology and so on, the Phoenix violin represents Chinese violin manufactur ing technology and is a hot seller worldwide.
Phoenix g uitars, adopt ing Spanish guitar production technique s , pa ys great attention to raw material selection, proficiency regarding the principle of pronunciation, inside beam structure and also gives the most wonderful hand feeling and while creating a " crystal and transparent " sound. Combined with environment all y friendly paint, Phoenix guitar colors and sounds never fade.
Phoenix u kulele s , not only promot e a variety of cartoon image designed ukuleles for children , but also produce a quantity of professional ones for the professional performers in many countries and regions, such as the United States , Germany , Italy , Holland , France , Japan and South Korea and other places.
Phoenix is an excellent pioneer and representative for the new generation of Chinese musical instrument manufacture rs , who are now spreading the " Chinese voice " through P hoenix musical instruments to the world.
Positioned as a famous international brand, Inneo attends various professional instrument exhibitions every year worldwide. For example, the Musik Messe , Namm Show in USA and Russia , Music China, Music Guangzhou, Beijing International Exhibition, Music Instrument Fair and Expo Music
Inneo will help show the high quality and aesthetic designs of Chinese musical instrument brands and in turn help to influence the world's musical instruments industry.
Nantong Inneo Musical Instrument Co., Ltd
